courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

Choose one of the following: STAT130, STAT217, STAT218, or STAT251.

Required in Major or Support; also satisfies General Education (GE) requirement.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

Any Approved Elective course can go here.

36 Approved Elective units. At least 24 units must be upper-division courses with a lecture or seminar component. Students encouraged to pursue minors or develop other areas of interest outside of Journalism. This excludes activity-only, lab-only, or supervision courses such as internships.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Electives (8). Any Writing/Digital or Audio/Visual Path course can go here. Students must choose between the Writing/Digital Path or the Audio/Visual Path. See catalog for more course details. Writing/Digital Path: JOUR350, JOUR352, & JOUR407. Audio/Visual Path: JOUR333, JOUR353, & JOUR338 or JOUR346 or JOUR348 or JOUR378.
